hadiths.text: This traditions has also been narrated by Muhammad b. Muslim al-Zuhr through a different chain of transmitters and to the same effect. This version adds; He should perform two prostrations before giving the salutation

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ يُتِمُّ عَلَى أَكْبَرِ ظَنِّهِ
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Said He Should Complete (The Prayers) Based Upon His Strongest Judgement
